Spotlight.name: Spotlight
Spotlight.comment: Manufactor from Mailand, Italy with more than 45 Years Experience to develop and build Luminaires. The New GreenLine offers Fresnels, PCs and ZoomProfiles with LEDs. From 25W up to 600W  in the moment.

fixtures.name: ARC Beamlight 16bit

fixtures.comment: the Yoke in 16bit the Fresnel in 8bit

fixtures.name: ARC Fresnel 250W TW
fixtures.comment: Yoke in 16bit and Fresnel 250W TW (Tunable White) in 8bit

fixtures.name: ARC only Yoke in 16bit
